lead_paragraph: The British shoe brand Dr. Martens is marking the anniversary of its mainstay boot, introduced on April 1, 1960, with a campaign that salutes its youthful customers and their ardor for music.
snippet: The British shoe brand Dr. Martens is marking the anniversary of its mainstay boot, introduced on April 1, 1960, with a campaign that salutes its youthful customers and their ardor for music.

headline.main: Dr. Martens Kicks Off 50 Years of Boot Business With 'Cover' Campaign

abstract: The British shoe brand Dr. Martens is marking the anniversary of its mainstay boot, introduced on April 1, 1960, with a campaign that salutes its youthful customers and their ardor for music.
